question: Which of the following system in an octahedral complex has maximum unpaired electrons?
explanation: <katex>$d^7$</katex> high spin (<katex>$t_{2g}^5 e_g^2$</katex>) has 3 unpaired electrons. <katex>$d^4$</katex> low spin has 2. <katex>$d^6$</katex> low spin has 0. <katex>$d^9$</katex> has 1.
